metadata.name: Love Letters - (Savage Degens)
metadata.description:
Introducing the Letterverse, a breathtaking and profound journey into the soul of British indie singer-songwriter Josh Savage. This transcendent album, titled “Another Life” on Spotify, captures the essence of human connection, love, and longing. The concept behind “Love Letters” revolves around two pen pals who first met in Paris and continued to visit each other all over the world, only to be permanently separated during the pandemic. Their heartfelt letters inspired this emotional and inspiring collection of songs. 
 For the first time, an entire album has been converted to a metaverse, with worlds built around the themes of the songs. If you go through each world, you’ll also be rewarded with a POAP for being there at the start of this brand new art form!
metadata.title: Love Letters

project.title: Love Letters
project.description: Have you ever fallen in love? Isn't it absolutely exhilarating yet terrifying? “Letterverse” brings Josh Savage's Love Letters album to life, with a multiplayer metaverse built around each song.

albumDetails.name: Young Fools
albumDetails.description: A passionate ode to the fleeting nature of youth and the desire to hold onto the glow of a moment, evoking feelings of adventure, longing, and the inescapable passage of time.

albumDetails.name: In Too Deep
albumDetails.description: A tender ballad that captures the heart-stopping sensation of falling in love, skillfully conveying the vulnerability and joy of discovering a profound connection with another soul.

albumDetails.name: Compass in the Dark
albumDetails.description: A stunning anthem of love and longing across great distances, serving as a beacon of hope and a source of strength when we feel lost.

albumDetails.name: Someone to Miss
albumDetails.description: An achingly beautiful exploration of gratitude for the love that makes separation bearable, reminding us of the gift of having someone in our lives who leaves a profound impact that we cannot help but miss when they're gone.

albumDetails.name: Don't Mind the Rain
albumDetails.description: A soothing, introspective track that invites listeners to find comfort in the simple beauty of life's quiet moments and the reflection and growth that turbulent storms can bring.

albumDetails.name: Stay Away
albumDetails.description: A song that delves into the struggle of self-worth and the fear of causing heartbreak, poignantly conveying the internal battle between wanting to protect a loved one and the yearning to be close.

albumDetails.name: How Far I've Come
albumDetails.description: An uplifting and triumphant ode to personal growth and self-discovery, celebrating the journey and recognizing the incredible progress made along the way.

albumDetails.name: Imprint
albumDetails.description: A hauntingly beautiful closing track that expresses unspoken love and the lasting impact of a fleeting connection, highlighting the power of a single encounter to leave an indelible mark on our souls.
